Title: Pledging Mr. Johnson
Plot: Grissom and Catherine investigate when a leg is found severed from a body in a lake. Sara and Nick investigate a fraternity pledging gone terribly wrong.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Harrison Young, Jim Ortlieb, Vito Ruginis, Mark Famiglietti, Craig Allen Wolfe, Grant Heslov, Robert Dolan, Mark Daneri, Paul Terrell Clayton, Amy Collett, Nicole Tarantini, Elliott Grey, Chris Demetral, Craig Al
